oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dreams versus Reality: Plenary Debate Session on Quantum Computing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Abbott, Derek
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a transcript of a debate on quantum computing that took place at 6:00pm, Wednesday, 4th June 2003, La Fonda Hotel, Santa Fe, USA. Transcript editor: Derek Abbott. Pro Team: Carlton M. Caves, Daniel Lidar, Howard Brandt, Alex Hamilton. Con Team: David Ferry, Julio Gea-Banacloche, Sergey Bezrukov, Laszlo Kish.
